scripts.warn-win: echo The Windows scripts have not been fully tested and may need an update...
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run ensure-dir && npm run copy-module && npm run copy-readme && npm run copy-package-json
scripts.build-win: npm run warn-win && npm run clean-win && npm run ensure-dir && npm run copy-module-win && npm run copy-readme-win && npm run copy-package-json-win
scripts.release: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run publish-to-npm
scripts.release-win: npm run lint && npm run build-win && npm run publish-to-npm
